meanings.definition: Of intermediate size; neither large nor small.
meanings.sent1: The midsize dog was not too big or too small.
meanings.sent2: She preferred a midsize backpack for her daily commute.
meanings.sent3: The midsize cupcake was just right for the hungry child.
meanings.sent4: His midsize talent shone brightly among the other performers.
meanings.sent5: The midsize tree provided just enough shade on a hot day.

meanings.definition: A car that is larger than a compact car but smaller than a full-size car.
meanings.sent1: The family decided to buy a midsize sedan for their road trip.
meanings.sent2: He admired the sleek design of the new midsize SUV.
meanings.sent3: The midsize vehicle fit perfectly in the crowded parking lot.
meanings.sent4: She dreamt of driving a midsize convertible along the coast.
meanings.sent5: The midsize car offered a good balance of space and fuel efficiency.
